findings.title: Refactoring suggestions
findings.description: Portions of the code can be refactored to improve readability and consistency.

findings.title: Unclear function description
findings.description: The function name `anyRateIsInvalidAtRound()` could be misunderstood since it checks if a rate at a round is invalid relative to the current timestamp `now`, but could be interpreted as 'checks if the rate was invalid at the time of the round'. In-line comments to explain the use of this function would aid users reading the codebase.

findings.title: Design comments
findings.description: Actions to improve the functionality and readability of the codebase are outlined.
